item.description:
Meet other singles near you! Come to a Singles Meetup and flirt with fellow minglers for fun, friendship...and maybe more! Learn about personality types, meeting people skills, communication skills, dating and romantic tips. Come to Herb's networking parties and singles and relationship workshops.

Herb Pearce, M.Ed., a relationship coach for singles, couples and families for 30 years, is a expert on understanding personality differences and has taught thousands of public workshops on understanding and enhancing relationship dynamics, as well as presentations and trainings for groups, organizations and companies on ways to communicate well with any personality style. He is the author of the Idiot's Guide to the Power of the Enneagram, the main personality system that he teaches besides the Myers-Briggs. Check out his personality types events at his other meetup group at www.meetup.com/Enneagram-Group. Herb Pearce 781 648 3737 www.herbpearce.com, herb@herbpearce.com. His new book, "Herb's Tips for Living" is available at www.herbstipsforliving.com.
item.name: The Arlington Singles Events
